channel.title: [PI] SKILLCAPES,7DUPEFIXES,STABLE,SOULSPLIT[PI]
channel.description:
[center]Server base: Your everyday standard unedited PI Client base: Galkon's Re-factored
This was done when I was a 'noob'. That is why it doesn't compare to my other releases.
Okay so I'll start by telling you I did this when I was novice this is also named bloodbarrage because I tryed to re-create a server I used to love, yet it was a delta.
And there is no anti leech as I will say in all my releases, an anti leech = not real release, anti leech's are for dick heads IMO.
THE DOWNLOAD LINK IS A PACKAGE! Download Link: [url=http://dl.dropbox.com/u/12213315/Bloodbarrage.zip]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/12213315/Bloodbarrage.zip[/url]
Heres the features my old server has:
- Around 7 dupe fixes, maybe more not sure( I did not do duel arena because I couldn't be ass'd) - Skillcapes - Combat tweeked, so its not the shitty PI one - Stability check + tweek. - Shitty curse prayers. - Quick chat - Couple custom sprites, but look like Fagex ones - Teleports in all mage books Light up.(as if you have runes, but you don't) - Quest tab little interface - Clan chat actually works unlike some Pi's out there - Private char doesn't fuck up when you use split private chat, it still works, or if you log out it still works - More that I can't remember because this is months old.
If people are to do projects, I would recommend using this as your base, because it has all the boring shit that you would need to do, already done. (:
I wish I could say I'm proud to release this, but its just so old, yet still up to date with half the servers out there... :fp:
So now I'm guessing you wanna see pictures right?
[URL=http://img831.imageshack.us/i/skillcapesh.png/][IMG]http://img831.imageshack.us/img831/6136/skillcapesh.png[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://img600.imageshack.us/i/soulsplit.png/][IMG]http://img600.imageshack.us/img600/6977/soulsplit.png[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://img189.imageshack.us/i/customsprite.png/][IMG]http://img189.imageshack.us/img189/205/customsprite.png[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://img195.imageshack.us/i/magetab.png/][IMG]http://img195.imageshack.us/img195/6851/magetab.png[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://img535.imageshack.us/i/questtab.png/][IMG]http://img535.imageshack.us/img535/1604/questtab.png[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://img805.imageshack.us/i/quickchat.png/][IMG]http://img805.imageshack.us/img805/4986/quickchat.png[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://img208.imageshack.us/i/finalpica.png/][IMG]http://img208.imageshack.us/img208/2458/finalpica.png[/img][/URL]
And please, if you don't download, be nice and think about the hot stuff, rep++ ( do not post don't ask for rep, because technically I am not )
Your friend, LimbO (Kaex)[/center]

item.title: [PI] SKILLCAPES,7DUPEFIXES,STABLE,SOULSPLIT[PI]
item.dc:creator: @Python1 Python_
item.description:
@Python1 wrote:

[quote=“demps2k9, post:20, topic:374806”]Umm. Basic PI.

I pretty much doubt you have fixed 7 dupes. If you did pm me what they are and I will look into them. If not then thats proof you are lying.

Quick chat is already in the PI. Clan chat already works on the original PI.

Also, if people were to do projects I would recommend not leeching like you and everyone else who makes a server. All people do is leech and say it’s there’s. News flash! It isn’t yours, your a leecher, a faggot, and you cannot do anything by yourself because you need someone to hold your hand and help you.

Why post something that you did nothing to. Dumb much?[/quote]

/facepalm…

You pretty much had a little nerd-gasim over nothing. Unless you can prove that he leeched this, which I doubt is true, that stfu and gtfo. Also, I bet he did fix the 7dupes. Though, there are many more. I have a server with I think, 16 dupes fixed? You cannot post pictures, to fix a dupe you just make a solution, or a way to avoid the dupe. If your going to troll, get your facts straight.

@on-topic:
Anyone who can fix Project Insanity dupes, is good in my book. Great job++.

Read full topic
